pull.title: Update copyright headers to 2019
pull.body: Updated copyright headers to include 2019 for files which had new changes made in 2019.

Update copyright headers to 2019

events.body:
Thanks, however copyright header updates are either done in PRs (where changes are made), or in bulk using a [script](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/contrib/devtools/copyright_header.py) prior to releases/new years etc. 

If you'd like to contribute to the project, please checkout the [good first issue list](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22).
